attributes.action: Give benefits to adolescents with ANY mental illness
attributes.additional_details:
When people have mental illnesses they often feel like they need a break and the money could be used to give them a break whether it be a holiday or a stay at a hotel or simply a day out to somewhere then a nice meal out please give them the right to have a day to try and escape their mental illness



To:
PM David Cameron
give benefits to adolescents with ANY mental illness we have signed a petition set up by Reece Browne you can contact him on 07999256726 or reecebrowne1@gmail.com as he would like the opportunity to discuss this matter with you personally

Sincerely,
Reece Browne and other signers
